entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
